tool_description: Calculates geographic distances and estimated travel times between warehouses and delivery locations.
error_messages: Invalid origin address: One or more origin addresses cannot be geocoded.
Invalid destination address: Destination address cannot be geocoded or is incomplete.
Too many origins: Maximum 20 origin addresses allowed per request.
Geocoding service unavailable: Unable to connect to mapping service for distance calculations.
usage: Provide origin_addresses array and destination_address to calculate distances and travel times from each origin to the destination.

average_distance.description: Average distance across all origins in miles
